availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, grocer. Native of Hull, England. Son of Michael Noonan and Mary Oglesby Noonan. Married to Emily Noonan. Father of Emily Noonan, Mary Noonan, Kate Noonan, and Anna Noonan. Grocer in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton, Covinton, Ward 5, p. 208. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton, Covington, p. 22. Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7015462, Covington, Kentucky Deaths, file no. 28829. Find A Grave, "John P. Noonan (December 10, 1826-January 10, 1910)," Memorial #99157384, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99157384 (accessed March 8, 2018).
